Instantly.AddIRCMessage: What the actual fuck?
Greetings to all of you, humble people
I think there is no need to introduce myself
Saw your recent job, quite a shock to everybody
I like your style!
We indeed expected a contact from you, but in a bit different way
Like what? Email?
I thought people recognize me for an unusual approach to different stuff
It is quite unusual
What are you operating with? How's that possible?
Whoa whoa, people. I don't know you, so many new names
I was hoping my old friend @Vortex would introduce you to me
Fuck
you
Oww, no need to be so rude
You're alive after all
I think we should just move on from past and look straight into the bright future
You can shove that bright future in your ass
Duly noted
Anyway, I thought that I am here to see some professionals who killed 58 people in a hospital and got away with it
And in the same time made their names in California Prime News
Yes, we are people of the business of course
One of your operatives seems to be hostile and irrational towards our partnership
He will be eliminated quickly if you require that
No
I have some plans on him
Let me introduce our group
Noooo. I think I made quite clear statement, that I want Vortex to introduce your group
If he won't do that, there is no business between us
@Vortex, please, cast off your pride and introduce NightHawks properly
What if I refuse?
Then you have to speak with Slayer in person
And that won't be a long conversation
Think straight for a moment. You want to revenge? Do it smart, not bold and stupid
You should listen what that man says
I am guaranteeing that I will give you my full attention if you just introduce your friends
Nothing more
It is not so hard
I am sure you know everything about them already
So you can quit that clownade, and we will talk face to face
I am assuming you are calling me a clown?
Exactly
Hmm. I don't like to work with people who insult me
So maybe I should go and look for someone more suitable...
No, we are sorry for this misunderstanding
I think Vortex meant that you've probably collected all info about us already, there is no need to be so easily offended, sir
Yes, just a stupid joke, he just had a rough day
I had a rough 2 months to be precise
And that man is the main reason for it
You want to get to me? Pay some respect and act like a gentleman
You are professional after all
Fine
Maverick, main dickhead of that little digital dumpster
Jenkins, little bitch that handles scripts and tools
Deladello, pseudo psychologist who thinks that being cynical 24/7 is cool
Slayer, an absolute crazy motherfucker who enjoys killing sprees
And last one, Prophet, don't know anything about him, he is just some quite guy
Are you happy now, piece of shit?
Not entirely a gentleman type of introduction, but hey, I will take it
Okay lads, I think you shouldn't be angry at him, he is in a really bad shape to be honest
Two months back he was a Police Captain after all
WHAT?
He was obedient man of the law
And now he helps you to murder 58 people
So if I were you, I would give him some credit
His real name is Cypher Mendes
I bet you all read the news about him 2 months back
A cop who worked with drug cartel?
Exactly
And now he wants to get to me for that little prank
You destroyed my life, crippled me, made me a murderer, and now making fun of me
I will kill you
That's not something a policeman would say, Cypher
But I will give you that opportunity
You just must have enough motivation and guts to do that
@channel I have a job to all of you
We are going to hit an FBI Database and all of you would have an opportunity to wipe of all your personal data and start a new life
But you need tools for that
Luckily, Vortex knows an address of a Police Asset server
But in case of his bad memory, I'll drop a link here
!ATTACHMENT:link#%#Asset Server#%#90.91.183.142
@channel But as you can see, it is protected with advanced EnTech security protocols
I have a special tool to break EnSec, but we can't breach whitelist yet
I know a place where we can get what we need
But to make it more interesting, Vortex will be leading this operation
I will upload a .dll that helps to break EnSec to Vortex's PC, and then you can attack an archive of EnTech that contains whitelist breach tools
Vortex can give that .dll to NightHawks, by uploading it in /home folder of this server, or he can unite with his girlfriend that he secretly contacted recently
What girlfriend?
On one of your contracts that you gave to Vortex, he made a contact with someone named Clara
Apparently, she is an ex-colleague of Vortex
Mothefucker

So, @Vortex, you have a pretty simple choice: upload .dll file to this server's /home folder if you want to unite with NightHawks, and I promise we will settle our matter right after and nobody will disturb us

Alternatively, you can send it to Clara's Workstation's /home folder and unite with her, if you think you still have some morality. But I am warning you, NightHawks will attack you both, and you may not see me ever again
You can't use this .dll youself, you need a partner who can make a valid .exe
So...
Choose wisely
